mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_postcode, user_address, user_detail_address ) values( #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_gender}, #{user_postcode}, #{user_address}, #{user_detail_address} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_id=#{user_id}
select * from user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
